name: Dash Slash
description:
In this game, the only way to move is to dash and slash through enemies!
You can however jump when you want, once before touching the ground.

Going through a green cube grants you an extra double jump!

Left Click = Slash
Space = Jump
     Press and hold space to add height to your dash!
     Letting go of space will halt your lateral momentum.
     This allows you to make more precise adjustments in mid-air.

R = Restart
